description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation Income Tax and NICs Calculated

summary.description: Summarises the Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due.

incomeTaxCharged.description: The total amount of Income Tax charged. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxDueAfterReliefs.description: The total amount of Income Tax due after reliefs have been applied. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxDueAfterGiftAid.description: The total amount of Income Tax due on Gift Aid payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNotionalTax.description: The total amount of Notional Tax. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPensionSavingsTaxCharges.description: The total amount of tax charges on pension savings. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

statePensionLumpSumCharges.description: The total amount of tax charges on state pension lumps sums. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxDueAfterTaxReductions.description: The total amount of Income Tax due after tax reductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeTaxDue.description: The total amount of Income Tax due. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

payeUnderpaymentsCodedOut.description: The total coded out amount attributed to PAYE underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nics.description: Summarises the National Insurance contributions due.

class2NicsAmount.description: The calculated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

class4NicsAmount.description: The calculated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNic.description: The total amount of Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance Contributions due. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99

totalStudentLoansRepaymentAmount.description: The total amount of student loan repayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAnnualPaymentsTaxCharged.description: The total amount of tax charged on annual payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalRoyaltyPaymentsTaxCharged.description: The total amount of tax charged on royalty payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeTaxNicsCharged.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance contributions charged. This field is returned if totalTaxDeducted is present. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxDeducted.description: Total amount of tax deducted from all income that has had tax deducted at source (reducing your Income Tax and National Insurance contributions charged). This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsDue.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due. If the totalTaxDeducted field is present then the totalIncomeTaxNicsDue figure is totalIncomeTaxNicsCharged minus totalTaxDeducted. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxRegime.description: The national tax rates and rules that apply to the calculation.

totalTaxDeductedBeforeCodingOut.description: The total deducted before coded out. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

saUnderpaymentsCodedOut.description: The total coded out amount attributed to Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

detail.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due.

incomeTax.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due.

payPensionsProfit.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for pay, pensions and profit income

allowancesAllocated.description: The allowances allocated to the pay, pensions and profit Income Tax calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the taxable income

name.description: The name of the tax band threshold.

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

savingsAndGains.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for savings and gains.

allowancesAllocated.description: The allowances allocated to the savings and gains Income Tax calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with savings and gains. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the taxable income

name.description: The name of the tax band.

oneOf.description: personal savings allowance awarded at basic rate
personal savings allowance awarded at higher rate

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lumpSums.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for lump sums.

allowancesAllocated.description: The allowances allocated to the lump sums Income Tax calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with lump sums. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the taxable income

name.description: The name of the tax band threshold.

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

dividends.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for dividends income.

allowancesAllocated.description: The allowances allocated to the dividends Income Tax calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with dividends. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the taxable income

name.description: The name of the tax band.

oneOf.description: dividend allowance awarded at basic rate
dividend allowance awarded at higher rate
dividend allowance awarded at additional rate

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsOnLifePolicies.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for gains on life policies.

allowancesAllocated.description: The allowances allocated to the gains on life policies Income Tax calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with gains on life policies. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the taxable income

name.description: The name of the tax band.

oneOf.description: dividend allowance awarded at basic rate
dividend allowance awarded at higher rate
dividend allowance awarded at additional rate

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAid.description: Details the breakdown of Income Tax due for Gift Aid donations. Only visible if Income Tax is owed on Gift Aid donations.

grossGiftAidPayments.description: The total amount of Gift Aid payments made for the tax year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

rate.description: The basic rate of tax that applies to Gift Aid payments made. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAidTax.description: The amount of Gift Aid tax charged if no reliefs or deductions apply. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAidTaxReductions.description: The amount of Gift Aid tax reductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxChargedAfterGiftAidTaxReduction.description: The income tax charged after Gift Aid tax reductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAidCharge.description: The amount of Gift Aid tax charged after appropriate reliefs and deductions have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoans.description: Details the breakdown of student loan charges.

planType.description: The type of student loan plan.

studentLoanTotalIncomeAmount.description: The total income used in the student loan calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoanChargeableIncomeAmount.description: The total student loan income less the threshold. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoanRepaymentAmount.description: The student loan repayment before deductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoanDeductionsFromEmployment.description: The student loan deduction collected by the employer. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoanRepaymentAmountNetOfDeduction.description: The student loan repayment after deductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

studentLoanApportionedIncomeThreshold.description: The student loan threshold. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

studentLoanRate.description: The rate income is charged at. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSavingsTaxCharges.description: Details of pension savings tax charges.

totalPensionCharges.description: Total of pension charges. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxPaid.description: Total tax paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPensionChargesDue.description: Total pension charges due after tax paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSavingsTaxChargesDetail.description: Breakdown of pension savings tax charges.

excessOfLifetimeAllowance.description: Details of chargeable amounts in excess of lifetime allowance.

totalChargeableAmount.description: Total chargeable amount for Lump Sum Benefit Taken In Excess Of Lifetime Allowance and Benefit In Excess Of Lifetime Allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxPaid.description: Total tax paid for Lump Sum Benefit Taken In Excess Of Lifetime Allowance and Benefit In Excess Of Lifetime Allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lumpSumBenefitTakenInExcessOfLifetimeAll.description: Details of lump sum benefit taken in excess of lifetime allowance.

amount.description: The amount of lump sum benefit taken in excess of lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: Tax paid on lump sum benefit taken in excess of the lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableAmount.description: The amount chargeable on the lump sum benefit taken in excess of lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

benefitInExcessOfLifetimeAllowance.description: Details of benefits taken in excess of lifetime allowance.

amount.description: The amount of benefit taken in excess of lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: Tax paid on benefit taken in excess of the lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableAmount.description: The amount chargeable on benefit taken in excess of lifetime allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSchemeUnauthorisedPayments.description: Details of pension scheme unauthorised payments.

totalChargeableAmount.description: Total chargeable amount for Pension Scheme Unauthorised Payments Surcharge and Pension Scheme Unauthorised Payments Non Surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxPaid.description: Total tax paid for Pension Scheme Unauthorised Payments Surcharge and Pension Scheme Unauthorised Payments Non Surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSchemeUnauthorisedPaymentsSurchar.description: Details of pension scheme unauthorised payments surcharge.

amount.description: The amount of unauthorised payments surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: Tax paid on unauthorised payments surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableAmount.description: The amount chargeable on unauthorised payments surcharges. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSchemeUnauthorisedPaymentsNonSurc.description: Details of pension scheme unauthorised payments non surcharge.

amount.description: The amount of unauthorised payments non surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: Tax paid on unauthorised payments non surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableAmount.description: The amount chargeable on unauthorised payments non surcharge. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSchemeOverseasTransfers.description: Details of pension scheme overseas transfers.

transferCharge.description: The amount of overseas pension scheme transfer charges. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

transferChargeTaxPaid.description: Tax paid on overseas pension scheme transfer charges. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableAmount.description: The amount chargeable on overseas pension scheme transfer charges. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionContributionsInExcessOfTheAnnualA.description: Details of pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance.

totalContributions.description: The total amount of pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPensionCharge.description: The total amount of pension charges on contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

annualAllowanceTaxPaid.description: The amount of annual allowance tax paid on pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPensionChargeDue.description: The amount chargeable on pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionBands.description: Details the relevant tax bands for the pension charges.

name.description: The name of the tax band.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The tax band limit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned tax band limit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

contributionAmount.description: The amount of pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionCharge.description: The amount chargeable on pension contributions in excess of the annual allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalShortServiceRefund.description: The total amount of short service refunds. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalShortServiceRefundCharge.description: The total amount of charges due on short service refunds. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

shortServiceRefundTaxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on short service refunds. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalShortServiceRefundChargeDue.description: The amount chargeable on short service refunds. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

shortServiceRefundBands.description: Details the relevant refund bands for overseas pension contributions.

name.description: The name of the tax band.

rate.description: The rate used to determine the amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

bandLimit.description: The total band limit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned band limit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

shortServiceRefundAmount.description: The amount of short service refunds. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

shortServiceRefundCharge.description: The amount chargeable. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nics.description: Details the breakdown of National Insurance Contributions.

class2Nics.description: Details the breakdown of Class 2 National Insurance Contributions charged.

weeklyRate.description: The weekly rate used to estimate the Class 2 National Insurance contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

weeks.description: The number of weeks used to calculate the estimated Class 2 National Insurance contributions. This value is a whole number in the range 0 to 52.

limit.description: The annual small profits threshold limit for Class 2 National Insurance contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedLimit.description: The apportioned small profits threshold limit for Class 2 National Insurance contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

underSmallProfitThreshold.description: Boolean showing whether the self employment profits are under the Class 2 NIC small profits threshold.

actualClass2Nic.description: Boolean showing whether the Class 2 NIC charge is an actual charge or estimate in this calculation.

class2VoluntaryContributions.description: Boolean showing the customer has requested to make voluntary Class 2 NICs contributions.

class4Nics.description: Details the breakdown of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions charged.

totalIncomeLiableToClass4Charge.description: Total income that is liable to Class 4 National Insurance Contributions before Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses have been applied. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

class4Losses.description: Details the Class 4 National Insurance Contribution losses in relation to the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions.

totalClass4LossesAvailable.description: Total Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses that are available to the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalClass4LossesUsed.description: Total Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses that have been used in the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalClass4LossesCarriedForward.description: Total Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses that have not been used in the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalIncomeChargeableToClass4.description: Total income that is chargeable to Class 4 National Insurance Contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

class4NicBands.description: Details the relevant Class 4 National Insurance bands

name.description: The name of the tax band threshold.

rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

income.description: The income within the Class 4 National Insurance Contribution band threshold applicable for contributions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

amount.description: The amount of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions due on the income within the band. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeductedAtSource.description: Details all types of income that have had tax deducted at source.

savings.description: Tax deducted at source from interest received from UK banks and building societies. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukLandAndProperty.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for UK land and property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cis.description: Tax that has been deducted at source under CIS. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

securities.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for securities. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

voidedIsa.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for voided ISAs. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

payeEmployments.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for PAYE Employments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

occupationalPensions.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for occupational pensions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

stateBenefits.description: Tax that has been deducted at source for state benefits. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUkTaxPaid.description: Tax that has been deducted at source on foreign income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

inYearAdjustmentCodedInLaterTaxYear.description: Tax that has been deducted due to an in-year adjustment that has been coded out in a later tax year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
